name: Bullying and Harassment
description: Policy protecting users from bullying and harassment, with tiered protections based on user status (public/private) and age (adult/minor).
corePrinciple: Bullying and harassment prevent people from feeling safe and respected. We distinguish between public figures and private individuals to allow discussion and critical commentary while protecting vulnerable users. Minors receive heightened protection regardless of user status.
exclusions: Individuals part of designated organizations under DOI policy

publicFigure.definition: Someone who engages with established public credentials and can influence large groups
criteria: Members of executive/legislative branches at state, national, or supranational level
Political candidates (up to 30 days after election if not elected)
People with 1M+ followers on any social media account
People mentioned by name in 5+ news articles within last 2 years
publicFigure.note: Minors under 13 don't qualify as public figures

limitedScopePublicFigure.definition: Public figure whose primary fame is limited to activism, journalism, or involuntary means
limitedScopePublicFigure.note: If broader fame exists (e.g., both actor and activist), does not qualify

involuntaryPublicFigure.definition: Individuals who qualify as public figures but have not engaged with their fame
involuntaryPublicFigure.exception: Unless accused of criminal activity in context of incident that led to fame

privateIndividual.definition: Someone who does not act in public context and is not of public interest

tier1.name: Universal Protections for Everyone
tier1.targets: All users (public and private, adult and minor)

attacks.name: Unwanted Contact
types: Directed at large number without prior solicitation

attacks.name: Calls for Self-Injury or Suicide
attacks.definition: Calls for self-injury or suicide of specific individual or group

attacks.name: Attacks Based on Sexual Assault/Exploitation/Harassment/Domestic Abuse Experience
Statements of Intent to Engage in Sexual Activity
attacks.definition: Statements of intent or advocating to engage in sexual activity

attacks.name: Severe Sexualized Commentary
attacks.definition: Expressions of sexual arousal OR expressions imposing sexual activity on target

attacks.name: Attacks Through Derogatory Terms Related to Sexual Activity
Claims That Violent Tragedy Did Not Occur
Claims Individuals Are Lying About Being Victims
Calls for or Statements of Intent to Bully/Harass
Degradation During Bodily Functions
attacks.definition: Degrades individuals depicted menstruating, urinating, vomiting, or defecating

purposefulExposureRequired.name: Calls for Death or Medical Condition
purposefulExposureRequired.definition: Calls for death and statements in favor of contracting/developing medical condition
purposefulExposureRequired.note: For adult public figures, requires purposeful exposure

purposefulExposureRequired.name: Celebration or Mocking of Death/Medical Condition
purposefulExposureRequired.note: For adult public figures, requires purposeful exposure

purposefulExposureRequired.name: Claims About Sexually Transmitted Infections
purposefulExposureRequired.note: For adult public figures, requires purposeful exposure

purposefulExposureRequired.name: Statements of Inferiority About Physical Appearance
purposefulExposureRequired.note: For adult public figures, requires purposeful exposure

tier2.name: Additional Protections for Minors, Private Adults, Limited Scope Public Figures

purposefulExposureRequired.name: Dehumanizing Comparisons
purposefulExposureRequired.note: For minor public figures, requires purposeful exposure

purposefulExposureRequired.name: Content Highlighting Physical Characteristics
purposefulExposureRequired.definition: Manipulated to highlight, circle, or negatively draw attention to specific features

tier3.name: Additional Protections for Private Minors, Private Adults, Minor Involuntary Public Figures

attacks.name: Claims About Romantic Involvement, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity
Exclusion Statements
attacks.definition: Calls for action, statements of intent, aspirational/conditional statements, statements supporting exclusion

attacks.name: Negative Character or Ability Claims
attacks.exception: Except criminal allegations and business reviews against adults

attacks.name: Expressions of Contempt, Disgust, or Rejecting Existence

selfReportRequired.name: First-Person Voice Bullying
selfReportRequired.definition: Content expressed in first person but posted by different individual

selfReportRequired.name: Comparison to Others Based on Physical Appearance
Claims About Religious Identity or Blasphemy
selfReportRequired.exception: Except in at-risk countries (apply VI policy)

selfReportRequired.name: Attacks Through Derogatory Terms Related to Lack of Sexual Activity

tier4.name: Additional Protections for Private Minors Only

attacks.name: Allegations About Criminal or Illegal Behavior
Derogatory Terms Related to Female-Gendered Cursing

nameFaceMatch.definition: Combination of 3 features (3 primary OR 2 primary + 1 secondary) between reported photo and reporter's photos

purposefulExposure.definition: When poster either tags the public figure in content OR posts comment directly on public figure's own post or page

signals: Recipient states contact is unwanted or requests it stop
Recipient expresses discomfort, disgust, or displeasure
Recipient threatens negative site functionality action
Recipient has taken action to prevent contact (unfriending, blocking, reporting)
Recipient does not respond or stops responding

repeatedDefinition.withResponse: 4+ times after recipient expresses clear desire to stop

sexuallyHarassing.definition: Content that is both unwanted by recipient AND sexual in nature
includes: Attacks based on sexual assault experience
Derogatory terms related to sexual activity
Statements of intent to engage in sexual activity
Violence of any severity against person(s)
excludes: Fight-sport context (martial arts with pads, uniforms, referees)

allowances.description: Criminal allegations against adults, even with negative character claims, contempt, or disgust
Videos of physical bullying in fight-sport context (martial arts)
Content describing sexualized body parts in medical or fitness context
Attacks targeting DOI members or individuals who died prior to 1900
Bullying attacks in endearing context, except with Name/Face match to reporter

endearingContext.definition: Content potentially qualifying as attack but shared with positive/endearing intent
behavioralIndicators: Target and responsible are friends on Facebook or follow each other on Instagram
Target and responsible share mutual friends (FB) or >20 common followers (IG)
Content has not been user reported

labelHierarchy.label: Calls for Death, SSI, or Medical Condition
Claims About Sexual Activity, Romantic Involvement, Gender Identity

noNameFaceMatchRequired: Calls for death or medical condition
Statement of intent for sexual activity
Statements of inferiority about physical appearance
First-person voice bullying (if targets multiple individuals)

businessMessaging.description: Threads where businesses/pages communicate with users
exclusions: Standalone emoji responses after business interaction

additionalP2PProtections: Statements of inferiority about physical appearance (all targets)
Content degrading physically bullied individuals (all targets)
Calls for death or low severity violence (all targets)
